description:
Centralized in-app notification system showing activity feed (mentions, updates, system alerts). Support multiple channels (in-app, email, push) with per-event-type preferences. Track read/unread state, allow batch actions (mark all read, dismiss). Implement digest emails for low-priority events.

**Rationale:** Users need awareness of system events without constant polling. Email-only notifications create overload; in-app center provides control. Granular preferences prevent opt-out fatigue. Expected pattern in B2B SaaS.
